description:
Flywheel Sports, the revolutionary indoor cycling brand with 28 studios in the US and abroad, has made it easier than ever to book your favorite fitness classes with this innovative app.  Purchase credits, reserve classes, and check performance data all from your iPhone. 
 
Ever feel like signing up for fitness classes is more of a workout than taking them? With this app, you can book your rides in seconds, check in before you even walk into a studio and invite friends to share the Flywheel experience with you.
 
Users say “easy to navigate,” “convenient,” “makes checking in a breeze!”
 
Key features:
• Reserve Flywheel indoor cycling classes and FlyBarre body sculpting classes at all studios across the country.
• Purchase credits, memberships, and gift cards.
• Skip the lines and check-in to class on your way to the studio (never fear that your bike or mat has been given away!).
• Use a sleek “Dashboard” as your control center to get a quick view of your most important account information including upcoming reservations, waitlists, credits available, and more.
• Invite friends to take classes with you.
• Track enhanced performance data with graphics and metrics.
• Check out “Class Rank" to see how you performed against other riders in class.
• View “Percentiles” to see how you compare to other riders in your region in speed, resistance, calories burned and more.
• Add classes to your calendar (and avoid those no-show fees).
• Provide feedback on all classes and instructors through the “Rate Your Ride” feature.
releaseNotes:
•Fixed a location services bug in iOS 8
•Minor visual tweaks
